title: SRI LANKA IS THE 5TH BEST COUNTRY IN ASIA – NEWSWEEK SURVEY REVEALS
content: In a survey carried out by the Newsweek Magazine, out of the 100 countries surveyed, Sri Lanka has been ranked as the world’s 66th Best Country. Finland has been ranked the best country and Burkino Faso as the last in the 100 countries selected. In the Asian region Malaysia stands ahead of all other countries…
